long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Doodle Jump - Chrome Extension
Get ready to bounce into action with Doodle Jump, the exhilarating Chrome Extension that takes you on a whimsical adventure through a lively, hand-drawn world!

In this fun-filled game, you control a charming doodle character as it jumps from platform to platform, aiming to reach new heights. Avoid obstacles, collect power-ups, and defeat quirky monsters along the way. With simple tilt controls and vibrant graphics, Doodle Jump offers an engaging and addictive experience for players of all ages.

As you progress, the platforms become more challenging, testing your reflexes and timing. Compete for high scores and see how far you can go in this endless jumping quest. Whether you’re looking for a quick gaming session or a longer play, Doodle Jump is perfect for keeping you entertained.

Join the jumping frenzy and experience the joy of bouncing higher and higher!

Download Doodle Jump and start your doodling adventure today!


*Note:We have added "Unblocked Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://doodlejump.net/
